toasts.inviteAcceptedDescription: You are now a member of "{name}".

toasts.profileUpdatedDescription: Your profile information has been successfully updated.
toasts.profileUpdatedErrorDescription: An error occurred while updating your profile information.
toasts.profileUpdatedPictureTooLargeDescription: The picture you are trying to upload is too large. Please choose a picture smaller than 1 MB.
